summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of L.I.D. No. 6665, for the improvement of 51st Ave. S.W. from S.W. Pritchard St. to approx. 85 feet north thereof; and certain other avenues and a street; by constructing sanitary sewers together with the necessary appurtenances and otherwise improving the same; under Ord. No. 105049, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
